snippet: The Eastman Kodak Company said it would also stop making pocket video cameras and digital picture frames, signifying the end of an era for the company.
abstract: Eastman Kodak Company says it will stop making digital cameras, pocket video cameras and digital picture frames, signifying the end of an era for the company that brought photography to the masses more than a century ago; company will phase out those production lines and look for other companies to license its brand for those products.
lead_paragraph: The Eastman Kodak Company said it would also stop making pocket video cameras and digital picture frames, signifying the end of an era for the company.

headline.seo: Kodak Says It Will Stop Making Digital Cameras
headline.main: Kodak Says It Will Stop Making Digital Cameras
headline.print_headline: Kodak Says It Will Stop Making Digital Cameras
